comments:
Eclipse F2, Win2000

My plug-in uses Xerces and Xalan. The libraries are in the plug-in
directory and imported in the plugin.xml (runtime-tag). After my plug-in
has been running once "Run Ant" crashes with the following exception.
When i restart eclipse "Run Ant" works. But only to the point when my plugin
is started again.

!MESSAGE org.apache.xerces.jaxp.DocumentBuilderFactoryImpl
!STACK 0
java.lang.ClassCastException: org.apache.xerces.jaxp.DocumentBuilderFactoryImpl
	at javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance
(DocumentBuilderFactory.java:139)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchManager.createInfoFromXML
(LaunchManager.java:361)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchManager.getInfo
(LaunchManager.java:422)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.getInfo
(LaunchConfiguration.java:335)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.getType
(LaunchConfiguration.java:266)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchManager.isValid
(LaunchManager.java:225)
	at 
org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchManager.launchConfigurationChanged
(LaunchManager.java:647)
	at  ...

I found the reason for this problem: i am setting the context-class-loader of 
the current thread to the plugin-class-loader. I have to do this, because 
without jaxp throws an exception (ClassNotFound). Now i restore the class-
loader of the current-thread after using jaxp. Ant runs again.

But this problem is new. I am doing this hack with the class-loader sice any 
weeks. Never had problems with ant. I think the problem is there since F1.
